posts.post_content:
Looking to fund a nice T206 Cobb Portrait (Red.)  PayPal preferred.  All prices include shipping.  Scans have been enlarged to show detail.  Emails take priority over posts.

[url]jason_carota@comcast.net[/url]

Note:  The Conway card is shorter than the others, as can be seen in the scans.  All backs are blank except for Daley.  Carpenter's card has paper loss on the reverse.  Ryan's card has dark staining on the reverse.

Ryan: $130 SOLD
Carpenter: $110 SOLD
Conway: $125 SOLD
Daley (Daily): $100 SOLD

[IMG]http://i139.photobucket.com/albums/q319/jay1065/40_n172_chi_nl_ryan.jpg[/IMG]

[IMG]http://i139.photobucket.com/albums/q319/jay1065/6_n172_cin_nl_carpenter.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i139.photobucket.com/albums/q319/jay1065/8_n172_bos_nl_conway.jpg[/IMG] 

[IMG]http://i139.photobucket.com/albums/q319/jay1065/11_n172_ind_nl_daley.jpg[/IMG] [IMG]http://i139.photobucket.com/albums/q319/jay1065/11_n172_ind_nl_daley_back.jpg[/IMG]

I'll take the Conway, Jason.

regards,
   Anthony
